steps.name: I check that the Saucelabs session is preserved

parameters.name: userProfile
parameters.value: {PHONE_NUMBER=780779000, EMAIL=pawel.tokarczuk@gmaptest.com, PASSWORD=#Test123, PHONE_COUNTRY_PREFIX=+48, FIRST_NAME=Pawel, BUSINESS_UNIT=NO, OTP=000000, LAST_NAME=Tokarczuk, PHONE_COUNTRY=Poland}

steps.name: I skip linking my card
I mock the location of the device to "SWEDEN_20888"
I click on "ACCOUNT" button
I check that the "Account Screen" is displayed
I check that the "Profile" tab is displayed
I click on "BUILD NUMBER" tab
I click on "SET LOCATION" button
I enter the location data of the "SWEDEN_20888" station
I check "Set Location" page is visible
I enter the site ID "SWEDEN_20888" in the input
I click on "SET LOCATION" button
I click on "Car Wash" advertisement
I check if "Car Wash" advertisement is displayed
I close and open application
I make sure that the location is set correctly
I check that the "Home Screen" is displayed
I check that the "Home Screen" is displayed
I click on "BUY FUEL" tab
I swipe on the home screen to the "DOWN" to see "GIFT_CARDS" section
I click on "GIFTCARD CAROUSEL CTA"
I check that the "Select Customize Gift Card Page" is displayed
I click on the mini gift card
I check that the "Select Customize Gift Card Page" is displayed
I verify that the "DELIVER BY EMAIL" is displayed
I verify that the "DELIVER BY SMS" is displayed
I verify that the "GENERATE A LINK" is displayed
I verify that the "RECIPIENT EMAIL" is displayed
I verify that the "GIFT MESSAGE" is displayed
I click on the "GENERATE A LINK" radio button
I click on "CONTINUE" button
I check that the "Review Purchase Screen" is displayed
I get the text from the gift value label on the "Review Purchase Screen"
I check that the application text: "Gift value" is equals to expected value: "Gift value"
I click on "PURCHASE" button
I suspend the test execution for "10" seconds
I check that the "Your gift is ready Page" is displayed
I click on "COPY" button
